TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug that decreases fever, swelling, pain, and redness. Also called NSAID.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "medicamento antinflamatorio no esteroide"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento que disminuye la fiebre, la hinchazón, el dolor y el enrojecimiento. También se llama AINE.
